author: {'steamid': '76561198072056746', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 60, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 40, 'last_played': 1619698921}
review: Sadly the game was abandoned. It seems that it was never finished and is a little buggy. Sadly some features doesn't seem to work. But if you have the chance to buy it on sale or get the key somewhere cheap, I still recommend buying it, since the tutorial/training sequence helped me a lot memorizing the Hiragana in a quite fun way. That said, don't expect too much.
